page.title: 19Mischief Night
page.content: Mischief Night is on November 4th. There were 7 of us down at the bottom of the hill in Shakespeare Avenue Campsall.We had two bangers and two rockets and we went to Mr.Smith's garden on the corner of Avenue Road. We put one rocket in Mr.Smith's garden and lit it.It went up in the air and came down the chimney of the house. We ran down to Dave's shops on Bourne Road. Workers had been building houses and they had dug the ground up. It had been raining and the mud was very wet. So we got handfulls of the mud and threw it at the windows of some houses. Then we started letting bangers off outside some houses and smashing milk bottles by the shops.
